conversion_verification.notes: The second image is a true 3D cutaway (height, thickness, angled view, and interior volume are clearly present), but it fails mandatory content completeness: a majority of rooms/spaces from the 2D plan are not represented in the 3D model.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Scoring skipped due to automatic rejection (missing >50% of rooms/spaces from source plan).

detected_errors.description: More than 50% of rooms/spaces from the 2D plan are missing or not clearly represented in the 3D render (e.g., multiple bedrooms/activity areas, laundry/pantry, alfresco/verandah/portico, and several labeled ancillary spaces are not evident).

summary: Despite being a genuine 3D cutaway, the render is rejected because it omits a majority of the floor plan’s rooms/spaces, making it not a faithful 2D-to-3D conversion.
